summary: It starts with a guy trying to get a girl he met at a party to like him. She refuses but he doesn't give up and story continues in a long and interesting conversation between them during which he manages to gain her attention.
cast: Javier Pereira|Aura Garrido|Jesús Caba|Susana Abaitua|Lorena Mateo|Miriam Marco|Helena Sanchis-Guarner|Javier Santiago|Daniel Jiménez
title: Stockholm
